input.sentences: arriving for the colorful garden display | the ground cover could already be seen blooming .
a lovely path wound around some trees to the homes and gardens .
you could see the locals carefully tending their flowers .
the small gardens had lovely displays in yellows and reds .
we also saw some magenta and white plants as well .
output.sentences: Walking through the park is one of my favorite things to do on a nice spring morning.
My favorite trail is one that winds from left to right, cutting through trees and across the stream that runs through the park.
Some mornings, I come across a little old man who tends to these gardens.
I express my gratitude to him and he points me to the brand new area that he recently planted, beautiful white and yellow flowers.
As I walk back towards my car, I see this beautiful site with its white and magenta plants.
